days.description: Number of days the transaction is taking over and its mentioned in 'Days' column

price.description: The price per unit involved in the transaction. Mentioned in the 'Price' column

amount.description: The monetary amount involved in the transaction. Transactions which are marked as sales should be positive. Transactions which are marked as purchases (buys) should be negative. Mentioned in the 'Amount' column.

volume.description: The TOTAL VOLUME of the transaction. Mentioned in the 'Total Volumes' column. Always ensure volume = amount / price.

buy_sell.description: All transactions marked under 'Sales to Koch Energy Services, LLC' sub header should be considered as 'Sell'. All transactions marked under 'Purchases from Koch Energy Services, LLC' sub header should be considered as 'Buy'.

location.description: Location used for delivery of the gas. Mentioned in the 'Point Number' column. Consider the entire value of the column as the location name.

pipeline.description: Pipeline used for delivery of the gas. Mentioned in the 'Pipeline' column.

deal_number.description: The unique identifier for the transaction. Mentioned in the 'Confirm ID' column

line_items.description: Be precise and thorough. Mark required, missing fields as null. Omit optional fields. You are processing financial documents that outline the purchase and sale of natural gas. Transactions which are marked as sells should be positive. Transactions which are marked as purchases (buys) should be negative.

invoice_total.description: This is the gross invoice amount mentioned besides 'Net Payable Due to Koch Energy Services, LLC'. Mark amount as negative if it is payable to 'Koch Energy Services, LLC'
